config.farlands.title: FarLands configuration
config.farlands.killEntities: Kill falling block entities in Far Lands
config.farlands.category.world.warning: These options are global! They will affect any chunks generated with this mod enabled, you have been warned!
config.farlands.category.fixes.subcatego: These options are experimental! They could break your world or cause any given set of problems, you have been warned!
config.farlands.fixLighting.tooltip.desc: This fixes lighting issues up to X/Z: ±2^26 / ±67108864.
config.farlands.fixLighting.tooltip.warn: It is not recommended to enable this option on a server.
config.farlands.fixLighting.tooltip.worl: This option cannot be toggled while in a world!
config.farlands.fixParticlesEntities.too: This fixes precision loss with the following particles:
This fixes precision loss with the following entities:
config.farlands.fixOreGeneration.tooltip: This fixes precision loss with ore generation, causing ores to be always X blocks apart from each other at far X/Z positions
config.farlands.fixMobSpawning.tooltip: This fixes precision loss with mob spawning, however mobs don't spawn past the default world border.
